content: add to your jewelry collection with these endearing crochet gnome earrings stitched in aunt lydia s crochet thread classic 10 you get 3 different sizes of character to mix and match sets of earrings for fun looks it s a great small project for practicing a variety of techniques including crocheting in rounds increases single_crochet 2 together and more make them in different colors to match every outfit in your closet materials sizes small medium large aunt lydia s® crochet thread classic™ 10 white & natural 400 yds/365 76 m colors 300 yds/274 32 m contrast a medium blue 4370 1 1 1 ball contrast b white 0001 1 1 1 ball contrast c ecru 0419 1 1 1 ball contrast d frosty green 0661 1 1 1 ball measurements small gnome earring approx 1 2 5 cm tall excluding earring wire medium approx 1¼ 3 cm tall excluding earring wire large approx 2 5 cm tall excluding earring wire notes body and hat worked in continuous rnds make 2 of desired size picture shows medium and large sizes of earrings
